channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Telegram Faces a Reckoning in Europe. Other Founders Should Beware
item.description: Politicians have long complained of Telegram CEO Pavel Durov's attitude problem. What's changed is their response.

item.title: France formally charges Telegram founder, Pavel Durov, over organized crime on messaging app

item.title: Major Sites Are Saying No to Apple’s AI Scraping

item.title: AI dominates India’s Reliance annual general meeting

item.title: Durex India spilled customers’ private order data
